fields.text:
Features that empower without imprisoning
-------------------------------------------------

* Wherever possible, we use __email as the interface__, reducing the number of websites and passwords your participants will need to remember
* Data export and import allows the use of our tools to __alleviate specific pain-points__ while maintaining your current workflow for everything else
* Our __progressive pitch platform__ supports a huge range of competition formats, from YCombinator's one-time application to Seedcamp's tiered qualifications to universities' semester-long mentoring

Save time and money
-------------------------

* Scheduling alerts and invitations in advance frees to focus on more important things
* Avoid endless back-and-forth organizational emails
* Eliminate manual data entry, score normalization, and hand-written feedback emails

Run business pitch competitions as if riding on the backs of ten thousand winged interns.
------------------------------

* Automagically reminds and organizes your contestants and judges
* Flexible competition engine manages can manage the entire process from application through awards
* Your data is yours -- contest information is always 100% exportable to a variety of offline formats

When you first signed up for this competition we should have sent you an email with a link to your saved application. 

If you don't have that message, enter your email below and we'll send you another reminder.
We send the link through email instead of just showing it to you to help keep your application private.

Your pitch has been received. Thanks for applying and good luck!

We'll keep you in the loop via email as the competition progresses.

You can edit your application until judging begins by returning to this webpage, which is linked in the first email we sent you.
